As a perimenopausal woman I overheat at the drop of a hat, so I was on a hunt for a layering piece that wouldn’t add too much insulation. This is perfect. Being sleeveless and lightweight minimizes overheating, the collar and slim bodice are great for layering under sweaters etc without bulk. The length of the hem allows it to be visible below the sweater if desired, but can tuck in easily. Washes well, but the wrinkles from folding/shipping require ironing/steaming out.  I bought the navy, but will be keeping an eye out for soft summer colors for future purchases.

I do not write reviews often, but sometimes I will if my opinion differs from the average consensus. I purchased a small for 36C gals and still have some wiggle room. I think that many times women do not realize their real bust measurement before ordering an item. This is why a great many returns incur. This top has the colors as vibrant as pictured and the sizing is correct by the table  to the consumer. The top is a bit longer than I like for I am only 5'5"@105, but otherwise the fabric is that of silky nylon and great for the price. One other issue I find the consumer can not get straight is the idea of sizing up or down. Folks, sizing up means larger and sizing down means smaller than your usual size!!!!!!
